subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The retired archbishop, one of the main symbols of the anti-apartheid struggle in South Africa, looks forward to the benefits of staging the World Cup next year, which he believes will far outlive the event itself.
snippet: The retired archbishop, one of the main symbols of the anti-apartheid struggle in South Africa, looks forward to the benefits of staging the World Cup next year, which he believes will far outlive the event itself.
